The following examples are implemented on this page

|:------|:-----|:-----|:--------|
| Minimum Wage | Card and Krueger | Summary Statistics, Diff-in-Diff | [R-Workthrough](https://datasquad.github.io/ECLR/Ex/CardKrueger.html) | 
| Debt Levels and GDP Growth | Reinhard and Rogoff; Herndon, Ash and Pollin | Summary Statistics, Weighting, Hypothesis testing, Regression | [R-Workthrough](https://datasquad.github.io/ECLR/Ex/RogoffReinhard.html) | 
| Firearm Laws and Homicide Deaths | Siegel et al | Data Collection, Diff-in-Diff | R-Workthrough: [Data collection and Prep](https://datasquad.github.io/ECLR/Ex/GunPolicyDataMgmt.html), [Diff-in-Diff analysis](https://datasquad.github.io/ECLR/Ex/GunPolicyDiD.html)
